00350 class CMPostgreSQL extends CMError implements CMDatabaseProtocol {
00351  
00357  public static function Version() {
00358   return "1.0";
00359  }
00360  
00366  public static function Since() {
00367   return "1.0";
00368  }
00369  
00376  private $autoCommit = true;
00377  
00381  private $dbh = false;
00382  
00397  public function CMPostgreSQL($uri, $a = false) {
00398   // dissect the URI
00399   $v = parse_url($uri);
00400   $v['db'] = basename($v['path']);
00401   
00402   // make sure the scheme is valid
00403   if($v['scheme'] != 'postgres' && $v['scheme'] != 'postgresql') {
00404    $this->throwError("Unsupported driver '{$v['scheme']}'");
00405    return $this;
00406   }
00407   
00408   // attempt to connect
00409   $this->dbh = pg_connect("host={$v['host']} port=5432 dbname={$v['db']} user={$v['user']} password={$v['pass']}");
00410   if(!$this->dbh) {
00411    $this->throwError("Could not connect to database.");
00412    return $this;
00413   }
00414  }
00415  
00427  public function query($sql, $values = false, $a = false) {
00428   // $a must be an array
00429   if(!is_array($a))
00430    $a = array($a => true);
00431    
00432   $sql = $this->bindValues($sql, $values, $a);
00433   
00434   if(isset($a['print']))
00435    echo "$sql\n";
00436   
00437   $q = @pg_query($this->dbh, $sql);
00438   if(!$q)
00439    $this->throwWarning("Query failed", array('sql' => $sql));
00440   return new CMPostgreSQLQuery($q, $a);
00441  }
00442  
00458  public function bindValues($sql, $values = false, $a = false) {
00459   if(is_array($values)) {
00460    $parts = explode('?', $sql);
00461    $new_sql = "";
00462    for($i = 0; $i < count($parts) - 1; ++$i) {
00463     // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00464     if($values[$i] instanceof CMConstant)
00465      $new_sql .= $parts[$i] . $values[$i];
00466     else $new_sql .= $parts[$i] . "'" . pg_escape_string($values[$i]) . "'";
00467    }
00468    $sql = $new_sql . $parts[count($parts) - 1];
00469   } elseif($values !== false) {
00470    // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00471    if($values instanceof CMConstant)
00472     $sql = str_replace('?', $values, $sql);
00473    else $sql = str_replace('?', "'" . pg_escape_string($values) . "'", $sql);
00474   }
00475    
00476   return $sql;
00477  }
00478  
00491  public function execute($sql, $values = false, $a = false) {
00492   $q = $this->query($sql, $values, $a);
00493   return $q->success();
00494  }
00495  
00516  public function insert($name, $kv = false, $a = false) {
00517   $sql = "insert into \"$name\" (" . implode(',', array_keys($kv)) . ") values (";
00518   $first = true;
00519   foreach($kv as $k => $v) {
00520    if(!$first) $sql .= ",";
00521    
00522    // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00523    if($v instanceof CMConstant)
00524     $sql .= "'" . pg_escape_string($v) . "'";
00525    else $sql .= $v;
00526     
00527    $first = false;
00528   }
00529   
00530   if($this->query("$sql)")->success())
00531    return $this->query("select lastval()", false, $a)->fetch('cell');
00532   return 0;
00533  }
00534  
00540  public function getTableNames($schema = false) {
00541   $filter = "";
00542   if($schema !== false)
00543    $filter = "where table_schema='$schema'";
00544   return $this->query("select table_schema || '.' || table_name from information_schema.tables $filter order by table_schema, table_name")->fetchAll('line', 'vertical');
00545  }
00546  
00552  public function tableExists($table) {
00553   return $this->query("select count(1) from information_schema.tables where table_name=?", $table)->fetch('cell');
00554  }

00563  public function getSchemaNames() {
00564   return false;

00577  public function availableMethods() {
00578   return array('commit', 'delete', 'disconnect', 'engine', 'eraseTable', 'escapeString', 'execute',
00579                'getClientEncoding', 'getClientVersion', 'getDatabaseName', 'getDatabaseNames',
00580                'getHost', 'getPort', 'getProtocolVersion', 'getSchemaNames', 'getServerVersion',
00581                'getTableNames', 'getTTY', 'insert', 'isConnected', 'ping', 'query', 'reconnect',
00582                'rollback', 'setAutoCommit', 'setClientEncoding', 'tableExists', 'truncateTable',
00583                'update');
00584  }

00589  public function isConnected() {
00590   return pg_connection_status($this->dbh) === PGSQL_CONNECTION_OK;
00591  }
00592  
00598  public function disconnect() {
00599   pg_close($this->dbh);
00600   return true;
00601  }
00602  
00608  public function engine() {
00609   return "PostgreSQL";
00610  }
00611  
00621  public function commit() {
00622   $success = pg_exec($this->dbh, "COMMIT");
00623   if(!$success)
00624    $this->throwWarning("Failed to commit transaction");
00625   
00626   // due to the way transactions are done, we manually check if auto commit is off and start a
00627   // new transaction
00628   if(!$this->autoCommit)
00629    if(!pg_exec($this->dbh, "BEGIN WORK"))
00630     $this->throwWarning("Can not begin transaction");
00631    
00632   return $success;
00633  }
00634 
00642  public function getDatabaseNames() {
00643   return false;
00644  }
00645 
00655  public function rollback() {
00656   $success = pg_exec($this->dbh, "ROLLBACK");
00657   if(!$success)
00658    $this->throwWarning("Failed to rollback transaction");
00659   
00660   // due to the way transactions are done, we manually check if auto commit is off and start a
00661   // new transaction
00662   if(!$this->autoCommit)
00663    if(!pg_exec($this->dbh, "BEGIN WORK"))
00664     $this->throwWarning("Can not begin transaction");
00665    
00666   return $success;
00667  }
00668 
00686  public function setAutoCommit($mode = false) {
00687   $this->autoCommit = $mode;
00688   if(!$this->autoCommit)
00689    if(!pg_exec($this->dbh, "BEGIN WORK"))
00690     $this->throwWarning("Can not begin transaction");
00691   return true;
00692  }
00693  
00697  public function __toString() {
00698   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00699  }
00700  
00717  public function eraseTable($tableName) {
00718   // need a valid database handle
00719   if($this->dbh === false)
00720    return false;
00721   
00722   $q = $this->query("DELETE FROM \"$tableName\" WHERE 1");
00723   return $q->success();
00724  }
00725  
00741  public function truncateTable($tableName) {
00742   // need a valid database handle
00743   if($this->dbh === false)
00744    return false;
00745   
00746   $q = $this->query("TRUNCATE TABLE \"$tableName\"");
00747   return $q->success();
00748  }
00749  
00762  public function update($tableName, $newvalues, $criteria = false, $a = false) {
00763   // $a must be an array
00764   if(!is_array($a))
00765    $a = array();
00766   
00767   $sql = "UPDATE `$tableName` SET ";
00768   $first = true;
00769   foreach($newvalues as $k => $v) {
00770    if(!$first) $sql .= ",";
00771    
00772    // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00773    if($v instanceof CMConstant)
00774     $sql .= "$k=$v";
00775    else $sql .= "$k='" . pg_escape_string($v) . "'";
00776    
00777    $first = false;
00778   }
00779   
00780   // add WHERE clause
00781   if($criteria !== false) {
00782    $sql .= " WHERE ";
00783    $first = true;
00784    foreach($criteria as $k => $v) {
00785     if(!$first) $sql .= " AND ";
00786     
00787     // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00788     if($v instanceof CMConstant)
00789      $sql .= "$k=$v";
00790     else $sql .= "$k='" . pg_escape_string($v) . "'";
00791     
00792     $first = false;
00793    }
00794   }
00795   
00796   if(isset($a['print']))
00797    echo $sql;
00798   
00799   $q = $this->query($sql, false, $a);
00800   if($q->success())
00801    return $q->affectedRows();
00802   return false;
00803  }
00804  
00816  public function delete($tableName, $criteria = false, $a = false) {
00817   // $a must be an array
00818   if(!is_array($a))
00819    $a = array();
00820   
00821   $sql = "DELETE FROM `$tableName`";
00822   
00823   // add WHERE clause
00824   if($criteria !== false) {
00825    $sql .= " WHERE ";
00826    $first = true;
00827    foreach($criteria as $k => $v) {
00828     if(!$first) $sql .= " AND ";
00829     
00830     // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00831     if($v instanceof CMConstant)
00832      $sql .= "$k=$v";
00833     else $sql .= "$k='" . pg_escape_string($v) . "'";
00834     
00835     $first = false;
00836    }
00837   }
00838   
00839   if(isset($a['print']))
00840    echo $sql;
00841   
00842   $q = $this->query($sql, false, $a);
00843   if($q->success())
00844    return $q->affectedRows();
00845   return false;
00846  }
